text: Hālāt kabhī bhī yahāṅ tak na pahuṅcheṅ ki ham Rab se sarkashī karke apnā muṅh us se pher leṅ. Nahīṅ, ham ne yih qurbāngāh bhasm hone wālī qurbāniyāṅ, ġhallā kī nazareṅ aur zabah kī qurbāniyāṅ chaṛhāne ke lie nahīṅ banāī. Ham sirf Rab apne Ḳhudā kī sukūnatgāh ke sāmne kī qurbāngāh par hī apnī qurbāniyāṅ pesh karnā chāhte haiṅ.”
